author: djd
msg: Change ValueNode.setCollationUsingCompilationSchema() to use the getSchemaDescriptor() method
that does not fail if the schema does not exist, e.g. when preparing statements the current
user's schema and that schema does not exist. Fixes the failures in AuthenticationTest.

msg: QPID-402: FailoverException falling through to client. All blocking operations now wrapped in failover support wrappers.
